job_title: Internship - Transmission and Distribution Settlements - Electrical Engineering (606)
job_description: Working collectively with the Transmission and Distribution Settlements team, you will help to ensure accurate and timely settlement (billing/payments) activities in area of distribution connected generation payments, distribution connected large customer billing, and transmission. You will be responsible for maintaining reporting, communication, and documentation in the department and help develop processes to create a more efficient and effective business unit. Responsibilities:• Receive, resolve and respond to all verbal, written and in-person communication from various lines of business and external companies.• Manage distribution connected generation, distribution connected large customers, and transmission work tracking excel databases.• Provide work assignment status update to staff, supervisor and team leads on request.• Assign and coordinate work within department.• Develop and deliver work packages to staff and various internal and external stakeholders.• Organize, prepare and lead meetings.• Complete preliminary documentation verifications for billing and payment setups.• Maintain electronic and paper documentation.• Review electricity system diagrams for the generators connecting to Hydro One's distribution facilities to detect potential impact on settlements.• Assist in analyzing certain parameters of customer accounts to ensure billing is within the accurate rate class as per the Hydro One Conditions of Service.• Develop, revise and implement procedures, guidelines and work instructions for various processes as required.• Update and maintain various programs, systems and databases based on changes that occur to customer information or identified errors which need to be adjusted.• Review technical and non-technical documents for Hydro One stations across Ontario to ensure correct settlement between Hydro One, local distribution companies and the IESO.• Recommend, participate, and implement improvements in business processes.• Perform other duties as required.This job will provide you with the following professional development:• Enhance your knowledge of customer service, reporting, meter data management software, and billing software.• Detailed knowledge of generation payments, large customer billing, and transmission settlements.• Insight into the Ontario electricity industry.• Provide you with stronger analytical skills
